definition: Jacobin club, French revolutionary party that played a leading role in the reign of terror 1791-1794
James Legge (1815-1897), Scottish Protestant missionary in Qing China and translator of the Chinese classics into English
Epistle of St James (in New Testament)

sentences.english: Jacob wagered his donkey, he did not bet his ass.
sentences.chinese: 雅各布担保了他的驴子，他并没有打赌他的屁股。

sentences.english: Most states are Jacobin in spirit.
sentences.chinese: 大多数国家在精神上都是雅各宾。

sentences.english: So he swore an oath to him, selling his birthright to Jacob.
sentences.chinese: 以扫就对他起了誓，把长子的名分卖给雅各。

sentences.english: 27The contoured surface of Jakobshavn Glacier at the fringe of the Greenland ice sheet, on July 19, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 格陵兰冰原的边缘，雅各布冰川表面的异样形状。

sentences.english: Last weekend , jacob and i prepared for our mid - term exams in the library.
sentences.chinese: 上周末，我和雅各一起去图书馆准备期终考。

sentences.english: Susan asked the woman who must be Jacob's wife.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊问这个肯定是雅各布的妻子的女人。

sentences.english: Zilpah, Leah's handmaid, bore Jacob a son.
sentences.chinese: 肋阿的婢女齐耳帕给雅各伯生了一子。

sentences.english: Jacob suffered severe threshings and grindings.
sentences.chinese: 雅各也曾遭受过不少难忍的磨练。

sentences.english: Then Jacob had to run away from home to live within his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 雅各只好逃离自己的家，到舅舅家去住。

sentences.english: Then Israel came to Egypt, Jacob settled in the land of Ham.
sentences.chinese: 从此以色列进入了埃及，雅各伯也就在含邦作客。

sentences.english: Why does he choose young Joseph, who's an arrogant spoiled brat?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他选择了雅各布这个侍宠而傲慢的孩子？

sentences.english: Then Jacob rose up, and set his sons and his wives upon camels;
sentences.chinese: 雅各起来，使他的儿子和妻子都骑上骆驼。

sentences.english: JACOB'S ROOM (1922) was based upon the life and death of her brother Thoby.
sentences.chinese: 《雅各布的房间》是根据她弟弟索比的死创作的。

sentences.english: And likewise also James and John, the sons of Zebedee , who were partners with Simon.
sentences.chinese: 西门的伙伴，西庇太的儿子雅各和约翰也是这样。

sentences.english: Rachel's servant Bilhah conceived again and bore Jacob a second son.
sentences.chinese: 拉结的使女辟拉又怀孕，给雅各生了第二个儿子。

sentences.english: So went the present over before him: and himself lodged that night in the company.
sentences.chinese: 于是礼物先过去了那夜雅各在队中住宿。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Gideon (name, from Judges 6:11-ffoll.)/also written 吉迪恩
Job (name)/Book of Job in the Old Testament
